ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Will allow you to build basic prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced anatomy studies and metal testing will allow you to build simple prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better prostheses are now open for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vancidium refinery
ResearchProjectDef.description: While combining random materials you discover how to create a very light but strong material that could be used for crafting more advanced prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade regular bionics with vancidium to make them even better.

ResearchProjectDef.label: surrogate organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gaining higher medical knowledge, crafting simple surrogate organs to replace missing ones becomes possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to create incredibly well-engineered artificial organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: rib replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small dispensers, you think about putting them in ribs.
